answers.answer: Refugees can benefit from services in the basic dental medicine package, which include consultation, treatment of simple caries, dental extractions, removable acrylic prosthesis, and devices for congenital malformations, among others.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients can benefit from services in the basic dental medicine package, and a list of dentists working with the National Insurance House is available for viewing.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Dentistry is available for refugees from Ukraine in Romania, with coverage eligibility depending on age, student/apprentice status, income, and whether they benefit from special legal conditions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Dental care costs are covered 100% for ages 0-18, and vary between 60% and 100% for those over 18, depending on the service type, with specific conditions for 100% coverage.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: For adults over 18, coverage varies between 60% and 100% depending on the service type, but is 100% for young adults aged 18-26 who are students or apprentices without income, and for people with special legal conditions for some services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Health insurance companies pay 100% of the rates for young adults aged 18-26 who are students or apprentices and do not earn income from work, including high school graduates until the start of the academic year (max 3 months).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Dental services are fully covered for ages 0-18, for young adults aged 18-26 who are students or apprentices without income, and for people with special legal conditions for some dental services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content states that health insurance companies pay 100% of the fees related to some of the dental services for people with special conditions, but does not list the specific services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A list of dentists working with the National Insurance House is available for viewing on the website.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Comprehensive information on dental rights is provided in the “Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system” by the National Health Insurance House.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.
